name: Elementalists
description:
In this game you have one goal. Defend the Elementalists' tower from an onslaught of incoming enemies using a variety of abilities. What's the highest wave you can get to?

*Requires 4 gamepads (and 4 players)*

Credits:

Ashley Edwards - Contributor

Ben Chittenden - Lead Programmer

Magdalena Tasić - Lead Artist

Mike Farrant - Producer
